a weak and reckless child."},{"lineNumber":259174,"originalJapaneseLine":"　自分が手伝ってやらねばいけない、まだまだひよっこだと","translatedEnglishLine":"He thought he had to help her because she was still a beginner."},{"lineNumber":259175,"originalJapaneseLine":"　それが、この短期間で再び会った時、ありえないほど強くなっていた","translatedEnglishLine":"But when they met again in such a short time, she had become unbelievably bitter."},{"lineNumber":259179,"originalJapaneseLine":"　これだけ努力して努力して","translatedEnglishLine":"He’s worked so hard and hard."},{"lineNumber":259180,"originalJapaneseLine":"　いや、短期間であるが彼らもすごい試練を越えてきたのであろう、それは分かる。","translatedEnglishLine":"No, although it was a short time, they surely overcame great trials—that much he understands."},{"lineNumber":259181,"originalJapaneseLine":"　だが、やっぱり納得出来ない。","translatedEnglishLine":"But still, he cannot accept Yell’s combat power is incredibly high,"},{"lineNumber":259188,"originalJapaneseLine":"まだ隙が多い、そこをうまくつけば勝てたはず","translatedEnglishLine":"But she still has many openings; if I had taken advantage of them, I should have won."},{"lineNumber":259189,"originalJapaneseLine":"いや、わかっていたけど、それをしなかったのは自分","translatedEnglishLine":"No, I knew that, but I didn't do it—that's on me."},{"lineNumber":259190,"originalJapaneseLine":"正々堂々と力比べがしたかったのだ。","translatedEnglishLine":"I just wanted an honorable test of strength."},{"lineNumber":259191,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスの子か・・まったくとんでもなく優れた種馬男だったのか","translatedEnglishLine":"The child of Rance... he was an incredibly exceptional stud man, wasn't he?"}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 控え室から出てきたエールを迎えるリセット
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Reset greets Yell as she comes out of the waiting room.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: やっぱり何もしなかったのね
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: So you really didn't do anything after all.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あたりまえだよ、ひどいんだよ・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Of course not, it was terrible...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こんな女の子が・・うんぬんと
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A girl like this... and so on.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 控え室
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Waiting room.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: パートナーとして捕まっているリセット
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Reset is captured as a partner.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その元に魔物隊長が現れる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The monster captain appears before him.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リセット、残念ごめなんなさい。私は幻術で・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Reset, I'm sorry, it's unfortunate. I used illusion magic...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺はかまわないぞ、人間なんてどれも同じだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I don’t care, all humans are the same.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 穴が空いていて、そこに突っ込んだら、ひぃひぃ泣き叫ぶ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They have holes, and if you shove in there, they cry and scream.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それを見て楽しむだけだ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I just enjoy watching that.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: と襲いかかる・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And then attacks...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＧＡＭＥＯＶＥＲ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: GAME OVER

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＣＧ：エール陵辱
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: CG: Yell's Humiliation.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 控え室
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Waiting room.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 敗北し捕まっているエール
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Yell, defeated and captured.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物将軍にレイプされます
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Is raped by the monster general.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＧＡＭＥＯＶＥＲ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: GAME OVER

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 背景：酒場
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Background: Tavern.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 闘神大会は２回戦まで終了し、明日から３回戦となる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The Fighting God Tournament has ended its second round; the third round will begin tomorrow.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: エールは次はアームズさんと対戦だと緊張している
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Yell is nervous about facing Arms next.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リセットと相談してアームズの強さについて研究
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Consulting with Reset, they study Arms’ strength.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス以外では唯一魔人を倒した人物
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The only person other than Rance to have defeated a demon lord.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 世界中のボス系モンスターを倒しまくっている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Has defeated numerous boss-type monsters around the world.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あらゆる伝説武具を集めまくっている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Collecting all kinds of legendary weapons.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: たぶん、人類の歴史上、どちらも最高記録と思われる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Probably the highest records in human history in both respects.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 改めて調べると化け物だな
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Looking into it again, he’s a monster.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この闘神大会、俺達との対戦は本気でくるそうだ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In this Fighting God Tournament, he seems to be serious about the match against us.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 自分が持ちうる最強のレア装備をしてくるそうだよ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He’s said to come equipped with his strongest rare gear.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: とエール達が次の事に悩んでいるが、側では
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: While Yell and the others worry about the next step, nearby...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ザンスと乱義が喧嘩しながらお互いをライバル視して認め合っている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Zansu and Rangi argue but recognize each other as rivals.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お前とは決勝まで当たらない組み合わせだ、ちょうどいい
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The matchups ensure we won’t face each other until the finals, which is just right.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お互い決勝で雌雄を決しよう。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Let’s settle it in the finals.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: えーっと、乱義さん、もし僕も乱義さんも勝ち進んだら、ザンスさんとの
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Um, Rangi-san, if both you and I advance, then with Zansu-san...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 前に対戦になるんだけど・・・なんか相手にされてない？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We’ll have to face off before that, but... doesn’t it seem like he’s ignoring you?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: コロシアム
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Coliseum.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: アナウンスが響く、エールとアームズの紹介
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The announcement echoes, introducing Yell and Arms.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: アームズはフル装備で現れます。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Arms appears in full armor.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 口に出したからかっこ悪いので心の声でもいいかな
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Since saying it aloud sounds lame, maybe internal thoughts are better.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: アームズは始めてエールとあった時、弱っちぃ無謀な子供とみていた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: When Arms first met Yell, he saw her as a weak and reckless child.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 自分が手伝ってやらねばいけない、まだまだひよっこだと
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He thought he had to help her because she was still a beginner.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それが、この短期間で再び会った時、ありえないほど強くなっていた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But when they met again in such a short time, she had become unbelievably strong.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 日光を使えるようになるのに自分は死ぬほど努力したが、それをなんなく為し得たりもした
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He had worked himself to death to be able to use sunlight, yet she achieved it effortlessly.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: これが最強と呼ばれたあの男の血なのか、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Is this the blood of the man called the strongest?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 正直・・自分の中の何かが納得いかない、いや、嫉妬している、悔しいと思っている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Honestly... something inside him isn't satisfied, no, he's jealous and feels bitter.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: これだけ努力して努力して
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He’s worked so hard and hard.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いや、短期間であるが彼らもすごい試練を越えてきたのであろう、それは分かる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No, although it was a short time, they surely overcame great trials—that much he understands.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: だが、やっぱり納得出来ない。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But still, he cannot accept it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私は、彼らの１０倍は冒険を続けた来た、まだ負ける訳にはいかない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I have continued adventuring ten times longer than them; I cannot lose yet.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 彼らに大人の強さを見せつけなくてはいけない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I must show them the strength of an adult.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞戦闘
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: > Battle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 裏路地
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Back alley.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: まいったな・・負けてしまったよとアームズ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'm beaten... Arms says.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私にも焦りがあったか、エールの戦闘力はとんでもなく高いが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Maybe I was anxious too. Yell’s combat power is incredibly high,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: まだ隙が多い、そこをうまくつけば勝てたはず
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But she still has many openings; if I had taken advantage of them, I should have won.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いや、わかっていたけど、それをしなかったのは自分
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No, I knew that, but I didn't do it—that's on me.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 正々堂々と力比べがしたかったのだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I just wanted an honorable test of strength.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスの子か・・まったくとんでもなく優れた種馬男だったのか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The child of Rance... he was an incredibly exceptional stud man, wasn't he?

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 控え室から出てきたエールを迎えるリセット
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Reset greets Yell as she comes out of the waiting room.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: やっぱり何もしなかったのね
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: So you really didn't do anything after all.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あたりまえだよ、ひどいんだよ・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Of course not, it was terrible...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こんな女の子が・・うんぬんと
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A girl like this... and so on.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 控え室
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Waiting room.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: パートナーとして捕まっているリセット
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Reset is captured as a partner.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その元に魔物隊長が現れる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The monster captain appears before him.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リセット、残念ごめなんなさい。私は幻術で・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Reset, I'm sorry, it's unfortunate. I used illusion magic...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺はかまわないぞ、人間なんてどれも同じだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I don’t care, all humans are the same.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 穴が空いていて、そこに突っ込んだら、ひぃひぃ泣き叫ぶ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They have holes, and if you shove in there, they cry and scream.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それを見て楽しむだけだ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I just enjoy watching that.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: と襲いかかる・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And then attacks...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＧＡＭＥＯＶＥＲ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: GAME OVER

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＣＧ：エール陵辱
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: CG: Yell's Humiliation.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 控え室
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Waiting room.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 敗北し捕まっているエール
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Yell, defeated and captured.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物将軍にレイプされます
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Is raped by the monster general.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＧＡＭＥＯＶＥＲ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: GAME OVER

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 背景：酒場
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Background: Tavern.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 闘神大会は２回戦まで終了し、明日から３回戦となる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The Fighting God Tournament has ended its second round; the third round will begin tomorrow.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: エールは次はアームズさんと対戦だと緊張している
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Yell is nervous about facing Arms next.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リセットと相談してアームズの強さについて研究
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Consulting with Reset, they study Arms’ strength.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス以外では唯一魔人を倒した人物
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The only person other than Rance to have defeated a demon lord.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 世界中のボス系モンスターを倒しまくっている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Has defeated numerous boss-type monsters around the world.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あらゆる伝説武具を集めまくっている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Collecting all kinds of legendary weapons.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: たぶん、人類の歴史上、どちらも最高記録と思われる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Probably the highest records in human history in both respects.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 改めて調べると化け物だな
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Looking into it again, he’s a monster.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この闘神大会、俺達との対戦は本気でくるそうだ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In this Fighting God Tournament, he seems to be serious about the match against us.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 自分が持ちうる最強のレア装備をしてくるそうだよ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He’s said to come equipped with his strongest rare gear.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: とエール達が次の事に悩んでいるが、側では
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: While Yell and the others worry about the next step, nearby...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ザンスと乱義が喧嘩しながらお互いをライバル視して認め合っている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Zansu and Rangi argue but recognize each other as rivals.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お前とは決勝まで当たらない組み合わせだ、ちょうどいい
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The matchups ensure we won’t face each other until the finals, which is just right.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お互い決勝で雌雄を決しよう。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Let’s settle it in the finals.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: えーっと、乱義さん、もし僕も乱義さんも勝ち進んだら、ザンスさんとの
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Um, Rangi-san, if both you and I advance, then with Zansu-san...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 前に対戦になるんだけど・・・なんか相手にされてない？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We’ll have to face off before that, but... doesn’t it seem like he’s ignoring you?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: コロシアム
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Coliseum.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: アナウンスが響く、エールとアームズの紹介
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The announcement echoes, introducing Yell and Arms.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: アームズはフル装備で現れます。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Arms appears in full armor.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 口に出したからかっこ悪いので心の声でもいいかな
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Since saying it aloud sounds lame, maybe internal thoughts are better.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: アームズは始めてエールとあった時、弱っちぃ無謀な子供とみていた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: When Arms first met Yell, he saw her as a weak and reckless child.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 自分が手伝ってやらねばいけない、まだまだひよっこだと
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He thought he had to help her because she was still a beginner.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それが、この短期間で再び会った時、ありえないほど強くなっていた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But when they met again in such a short time, she had become unbelievably strong.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 日光を使えるようになるのに自分は死ぬほど努力したが、それをなんなく為し得たりもした
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He had worked himself to death to be able to use sunlight, yet she achieved it effortlessly.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: これが最強と呼ばれたあの男の血なのか、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Is this the blood of the man called the strongest?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 正直・・自分の中の何かが納得いかない、いや、嫉妬している、悔しいと思っている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Honestly... something inside him isn't satisfied, no, he's jealous and feels bitter.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: これだけ努力して努力して
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He’s worked so hard and hard.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いや、短期間であるが彼らもすごい試練を越えてきたのであろう、それは分かる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No, although it was a short time, they surely overcame great trials—that much he understands.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: だが、やっぱり納得出来ない。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But still, he cannot accept it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私は、彼らの１０倍は冒険を続けた来た、まだ負ける訳にはいかない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I have continued adventuring ten times longer than them; I cannot lose yet.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 彼らに大人の強さを見せつけなくてはいけない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I must show them the strength of an adult.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞戦闘
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: > Battle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 裏路地
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Back alley.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: まいったな・・負けてしまったよとアームズ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'm beaten... Arms says.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私にも焦りがあったか、エールの戦闘力はとんでもなく高いが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Maybe I was anxious too. Yell’s combat power is incredibly high,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: まだ隙が多い、そこをうまくつけば勝てたはず
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But she still has many openings; if I had taken advantage of them, I should have won.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いや、わかっていたけど、それをしなかったのは自分
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No, I knew that, but I didn't do it—that's on me.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 正々堂々と力比べがしたかったのだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I just wanted an honorable test of strength.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスの子か・・まったくとんでもなく優れた種馬男だったのか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The child of Rance... he was an incredibly exceptional stud man, wasn't he?
